snippet: Atlanta prevailed, 15-13, after trailing by 6-0 against Roy Halladay and despite seven runs batted in by Philadelphia’s Carlos Ruiz.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Angels defeat Minnesota Twins, 9-0, behind pitcher Jered Weaver's no-hitter, the second in the majors in less than two week; other MLB results noted.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta prevailed, 15-13, after trailing by 6-0 against Roy Halladay and despite seven runs batted in by Philadelphia’s Carlos Ruiz.

headline.seo: Chipper Jones’s Homer Carries Braves Past Phillies in Slugfest
headline.main: Braves Edge Phillies in Slugfest on Jones’s Home Run in the 11th
headline.print_headline: Angels’ Weaver No-Hits Twins; Braves Edge Phillies in Slugfest
